ygData.subject: Re: Smithing changes with latest patch
ygData.msgSnippet: yes, and we all know what great smiths those Centaur s are... Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild -
ygData.messageBody:
yes, and we all know what great smiths those Centaur's are...

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com



----- Original Message -----
From: Benjamin Chen <savik1227.geo@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 8:16 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Smithing changes with latest patch


> From: "Benjamin Chen" <savik1227.geo@...>
>
> It's crafted by the centaurs =)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Lemac Justerian [mailto:lemac@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 1:30 PM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Smithing changes with latest patch
>
>
> I have often wondered how it came about that CRAFTED armor did NOT require
> the use of a blacksmith?!?! It's called CRAFTED though?? Who but a smith
> would be crafting armor??
>
> As to the ability to make weapons, if we cannot make Fine Steel quality
> weapons, where do they come from? Is there a mysterious NPC smith that
makes
> and sells all the FS items to the creatures? How pray tell do they get
them
> then?
>
> Smithing needs DRASTIC changes and enhancements to make it more realistic
> (making pots should be EASIER than making Banded armor, not harder) as
well
> as more profitable for the time it takes...
>
> Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
> Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com
>
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <madoc_ab_owain@...>
> To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 9:26 AM
> Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Smithing changes with latest patch
>
>
> > From: madoc_ab_owain@...
> >
> > I've heard weapon smithing is now implemented! Unfortunately they're not
> quite as good as FS, so hopefully they'll be either enchantable or a
> stepping-stone to a high enough skill level to make plate.
> >
> > Another item, not exactly a change but of interest to those smiths who
are
> paladins like myself: the new Temple zone supposedly has a Paladin who
will
> give you or give you quests for molds to make special armor.
> >
> > I can't get on to see what other changes may have taken place to
smithing,
> but check your vendors, check your books, and post back to the list what
you
> find.
> >
> > Thanks,
> >
> > Araman of E'ci
> > 17th level Paladin
> > Skill 142 Smith
> >
> > >
>
> >
